layer at (0,0) size 800x284

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x252
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x36

          text run at (0,0) width 748: "The test passes if, when moved inside the colored rectangle, the cursor looks like an animated butterfly AND is not a"
          text run at (0,18) width 148: "butterfly when outside."

          text run at (0,0) width 577: "If inside the rectangle the cursor does not change, or looks like a help cursor, the test fails."
